title: Implement secure login for customer access
description: As a customer, I want a secure login process, so that my account details are protected.
attributes_and_rules: Password complexity, session management, integration with identity providers.
core_domain_objects: Authentication module, user credentials, session details.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Ensure user creates a password that meets complexity requirements.
2. User login sessions must be managed securely.
3. Integrate with identity providers for authentication.
test_cases:
Given a new user, when they create a password, then the password must meet complexity requirements.
Given a user, when they log in, then their session should be managed securely.
Given a user, when they use external identity providers, then the login should be successful.

title: Enable multi-factor authentication for customer access
description: As a customer, I want multi-factor authentication, so that my login process is more secure.
attributes_and_rules: Multi-factor authentication (MFA), compliance with security standards.
core_domain_objects: MFA mechanisms, temporary codes, user account.
acceptance_criteria:
1. User should be prompted for an additional verification factor after password.
2. The system must support different MFA methods (e.g., SMS, email, authenticator apps).
3. Ensure compliance with banking security standards.
test_cases:
Given a registered user, when they log in, then they should be prompted for an additional verification factor.
Given different MFA methods, when a user selects one, then the system should successfully process the MFA.
Given the authentication system, when MFA is configured, then it must meet banking security standards.

title: Build a responsive design for the web portal
description: As a user, I want a responsive web portal, so that I can access it smoothly on any device.
attributes_and_rules: Responsive design, compatibility with desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
core_domain_objects: Web portal frontend, UI components, layout templates.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The web portal must be accessible on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
2. UI components should adapt to different screen sizes without breaking.
3. Ensure consistency and scalability in the design.
test_cases:
Given desktop, tablet, and mobile devices, when a user accesses the portal, then the design should be responsive.
Given various UI components, when viewed on different devices, then they should adapt without breaking.
Given the portal design, when the system scales, then it must remain consistent.

title: Ensure accessibility adherence within the portal
description: As a user, I want the web portal to meet accessibility standards, so that it is usable for all users.
attributes_and_rules: Accessibility standards, intuitive navigation, branding guidelines.
core_domain_objects: Web portal frontend, accessibility features, navigation elements.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The web portal must meet WCAG accessibility standards.
2. Ensure intuitive navigation for all users.
3. Design should follow branding guidelines.
test_cases:
Given the web portal, when evaluated for accessibility, then it must meet WCAG standards.
Given navigation elements, when used by users, then they should navigate intuitively.
Given branding guidelines, when applied, then the portal design should adhere.

epic_title: Integration Layer with Core Banking System
title: Develop APIs for portal and core banking system integration
description: As a developer, I want to create APIs for integration, so that the portal can communicate with the core banking system.
attributes_and_rules: API development, secure data transmission, real-time communication.
core_domain_objects: API endpoints, data transmission channels, core banking data.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Develop and expose secure API endpoints.
2. Ensure real-time data transmission between the systems.
3. Implement robust error handling and data validation.
test_cases:
Given the API endpoints, when exposed, then they should ensure security.
Given data transmission, when executed, then it must be in real-time.
Given error scenarios, when handled, then the system should validate and manage errors robustly.

epic_title: Integration Layer with Core Banking System
title: Implement data validation and fault tolerance in integration
description: As a developer, I want data validation and fault tolerance, so that the integration is reliable.
attributes_and_rules: Data validation, error handling, fault tolerance.
core_domain_objects: Data validators, error handlers, middleware services.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Validate data before transmission to or from the core banking system.
2. Implement error handling mechanisms.
3. Ensure fault tolerance to maintain integration reliability.
test_cases:
Given data to be transmitted, when passed through validators, then it must be validated.
Given integration errors, when they occur, then error handlers should manage them.
Given system faults, when present, then the integration should remain reliable.
